WorkItem.Description: Postings I am reading on wowhead else where suggest the proc on this trinket is 5% on physical hit with no cooldown.  That certainly seems to put the trinket more in line with others of its iLevel.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Darkmoon Card: Hurricane proc is Incorrect

Comments.Message: The problem with the Hurricane is that there is discrepencies on who you ask about the proc rate. If you can provide some place that shows how many attacks, how many procs and whether it was from a 2 weapons or 1.  This could really go either PPM based or %-chance and I've just have not found a clear winner in this argument.
